content.rendered:
Brittni Alexandra and her team at B.Beautiful have stayed true to their goal of helping as many people as possible in Canada and other parts of the world to remain stunning and attractive irrespective of the situation, with the beauty entrepreneur leveraging social media and other online platforms to reach her audience during restrictions as a result of the Covid-19 pandemic. In a related development, B. Beautiful is looking to introduce solutions to meet the growing needs of clients even after the pandemic.

I never had the mindset that I had to shut down my business, it was more about how do we change what were doing and stay open, said Brittni Alexandra.

The global brow industry continues to evolve, with the emergence of different solutions helping it grow to a multi-billion-dollar market. The Covid-19 pandemic hit businesses and industries differently, as statistics show a shift in demand for products in the beauty market and a change in the eyebrow threading industry. With more focus being on the brow due to the mask covering other parts of the face as people seek protection from the virus, it has become imperative for studios to deliver innovative solutions to help accentuate the beauty of clients even while wearing the covering. Thankfully, Brittni Alexandra of B.Beautiful has positioned herself and the studio to deliver the latest techniques in the industry to clients across Toronto.

B.Beautiful began doing lives as well as conducting virtual skin consultations during the pandemic, going a step further to create a massive e-commerce store for premium quality beauty products. The eyebrow services offered by B.Beautiful include Browmergency, Brow Tint, Brow Lamination, High Definition Brow, and B. Beautiful Brow.

In addition to the eyebrow services, B.Beautiful also offers other categories of beauty solutions, including face waxing and threading, makeup application, lashes, and beauty treatments. The comprehensiveness of the solutions offered by B.Beautiful has made the studio the go-to destination for beauty enthusiasts across Canada.

For more about B.Beautiful and the innovative beauty solutions offered, visit - https://www.bbeautifulbeauty.com and Instagram.
